00027 inline Pluma::Pluma(){
00028     // Nothing to do
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00033 template<typename ProviderType>
00034 void Pluma::acceptProviderType(){
00035     PluginManager::registerType(
00036         ProviderType::PLUMA_PROVIDER_TYPE,
00037         ProviderType::PLUMA_INTERFACE_VERSION,
00038         ProviderType::PLUMA_INTERFACE_LOWEST_VERSION
00039     );
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00044 template<typename ProviderType>
00045 void Pluma::getProviders(std::vector<ProviderType*>& providers){
00046     const std::list<Provider*>* lst = PluginManager::getProviders(ProviderType::PLUMA_PROVIDER_TYPE);
00047     if (!lst) return;
00048     providers.reserve(providers.size() + lst->size());
00049     std::list<Provider*>::const_iterator it;
00050     for (it = lst->begin() ; it != lst->end() ; ++it)
00051         providers.push_back(static_cast<ProviderType*>(*it));
00052 }
